entry.string: This is the name of the module that this block is to be associated with. Blocks must be associated with modules. When in doubt use the base module.
entry.translation: Thees is zee neme-a ooff zee mudoole-a thet thees bluck is tu be-a essuceeeted veet. Blucks moost be-a essuceeeted veet mudooles. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Vhee in duoobt use-a zee bese-a mudoole-a.

entry.string: This is the exact name of the block. It must be case specific, otherwise the block will not function correctly.
entry.translation: Thees is zee ixect neme-a ooff zee bluck. It moost be-a cese-a speceeffic, oozeerveese-a zee bluck veell nut fooncshun currectly. Bork bork bork!
